segments.text: I notice the girl standing near the boy, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she's anticipating something wonderful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, ready to receive a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows her mom is right there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching to reach the cookie jar, and she's patiently waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit envious of their innocence and excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks unstable, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's trying to be quiet so they don't get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar looks full, so they might have a good haul.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it and enjoy their treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene reminds me of simpler times, when getting a cookie was a big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit melancholic watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR
